The given aspect highlights how Pep Guardiola's trousers were torn during the Bayern Munich vs. Port match, exposing his underwear.

Pep Guardiola's actions during the Bayern Munich vs. Porto match highlight his focus on the game. Rather than being concerned about his appearance, he tore his trousers and removed his suit blazer to demonstrate his commitment to the team's victory. This shows his dedication to his team and his willingness to prioritize their success over his own comfort and appearance.

Bayern Munich's 6-1 win over Porto in the Champions League quarter-finals shows their dominance even with a two-goal advantage going into the game.

Bayern's opponents in the semi-finals of the Champions League will have a good reason to be nervous after their performance against Porto. The German giants put on an impressive display, thrashing their Portuguese opponents 6-1 at home. This showing of strength and dominance will likely have their next opponents worrying about the kind of pressure they will be under when they take the field against Bayern.
